title: An exposition of the festiuall epistles and gospels vsed in our English liturgie together with a reason why the church did chuse the same / by Iohn Boys ... ; the first part from the feast of S. Andreuu the Apostle, to the purification of Blessed Mary the Virgin.
author: Boys, John, 1571-1625.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed by Eduuard Griffin for William Aspley,
